post_title: Gavvy Cravath - T206 Piedmont 350 Factory 25 - SGC 5 (EX) 6-time NL HR Champ SOLD
post_content:
T206 Gavvy Cravath

Piedmont 350 Factory 25 back

Beautiful example of this under-rated ballplayer.

Newly graded SGC 5 (EX) 

SOLD

For those unfamiliar with Mr. Cravath, I suggest looking up his resume here:

[URL="https://www.baseball-reference.com/players/c/cravaga01.shtml"]https://www.baseball-reference.com/players/c/cravaga01.shtml[/URL]

Pacific Coast league star and nearly forgotten dead ball slugger with the Philadelphia Phillies. Late bloomer to major league baseball with a ton of Black Ink on his baseball reference page. A 6 time NL HR champ, all while in his 30's.

Pay almost any way you like.

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.
Great card, and GLWS….in my opinion one of the absolute best images on a T-2o6 card.

Price Drop

Now SOLD Shipped (In the U.S.)

Thanks.

And he was a Judge, long before Aaron was an embryo.;)
